title: Cho Gath Hit Box is confusing to me
body: What is with Cho Gath's hit box. There seems to be a discepency between is acutal hit box and the animation, also the timing seems weird. {{champion:31}}

replies.body:
I should be able to help out explain a bit further, but first I need to know a little more.  When you say his hit box is confusing, do you mean when you target Cho'gath with a spell?  Is this when he is very big vs small?  Are you talking about the hitbox of one of his abilities?

Reply back and let me know!
Yeah i mean is silence. Sometimes I feel like I see it hit things outside of the animation and not hit things that are clearly in the animation.

>Sometimes I feel like I see it hit things outside of the animation and not hit things that are clearly in the animation.

It does. The way his W works is that it finds targets as soon as he casts it, if you're in range of the spell on cast you will be hit, regardless of if you get out of the animation.

because they haven't fixed chogath hit box. if he casts it before u get out of the box. it still hits u even if the animation doesn't multiple abilities used to work like that including darius pull but they fixed that not too long ago. so yeah it will probably get fixed sometime in the future
